predicate.note: Frames file for 'adorn' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to decorate with or as if with ornaments

example.name: non-agentive
example.text: Baskets of roses and potted palms adorned his bench .
example.arg: Baskets of roses and potted palms

example.name: agentive
example.text: They note that he has adorned his office with five photos of George Bush , one of them featuring the First Dog , Millie .
example.arg: five photos of George Bush , one of them featuring the First Dog , Millie
